I'm looking for the candidates who can work on W2 basis. The members who are willing to work on W2, please share the resumes at Mansi.Yadav@adroitresources.com so that I can contact you directly once I get any requirement matching your profiles.

Adroit Resources Inc, is a dynamic Information Technology services company based out of California‘s Silicon Valley. Our offerings range from IT Staff Augmentation to Technology Consulting. We understand our client needs and take pride in providing them with the best services. Our candidates and turnkey solutions have helped us become partners with Fortune 100 companies and very exciting startups nationwide. With top clients to boast about, Adroit is making rapid headways in the industry and continuously look to work with the best talent and most admired companies. Adroit consistently invests in intensive training of IT professionals in cutting edge technologies and helps them connect with their dream companies.

Description:Collabera is a $550 million dollar USA based MNC with 9000+ employee base consulting firm, Head office located at Morristown, NJ USA. Collabera provides end-to-end IT solutions to the various fortune 500 organizations across USA. These solutions included Strategic IT consulting, Solutions (Software Development, Testing and managed services) and Professional services.Responsibilities:•	Experience in complete Professional Service Delivery Model which include Technical screening, HR Screening, Rate Negotiation, Vendor Management and Successful recruiting of qualified employees.•	Full life-cycle recruiting process included identification, sourcing, interviewing and on-boarding of professionals for contract and permanent positions.•	Responsible for evaluations of candidates, checking references, negotiating terms and rates for each project, coordinating the interview process, and closing candidates.•	Work on both Direct and Process requirements of Financial, Insurance, Banking and Telecommunication domain clients.•	Worked on Various Java related requirements which includes Java front end, Backend, J2EE, J2SE, J2ME skill set.•	Experience in requirement gathering with Business development executive, Understanding requirement, Analysis of requirement, Research on requirement and if require then Negotiation in the requirement.•	Experience in H1B Visa transfer process.•	Superior resumes sourcing, screening and interviewing skills with proficiency in using applicant tracking systems.•	Sourced best possible resource from the available Internal, Local, National and International Job Portal included Monster, Dice, Indeed.com, CareerBuilder, and LinkedIn.
Subject Matter Expert / Technical support executive

Description:•	Teleperformance India, established in 2001, is the leading provider of outstanding Customer Experience at every single opportunity. Known for its quality offering and outstanding people practices, Teleperformance India evolved into the preferred offshore contact center outsourcing option for English speaking nations. It is also a known name within the domestic market for its full suite of solutions extended in English and 10 regional languages (Hindi, Bengali, Gujarati, Marathi, Kannada, Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam, Punjabi, and Oriya). •	With operations spread across Gurgaon, Indore and Jaipur, over 4,500 Teleperformers deliver Multi-Channel Customer Service environment, with solutions ranging from Customer Care, Technical Support, Debt Collection, Customer Acquisition, Social Media, Data Analytics and Back-Office.Responsibilities:•	Involved in Troubleshooting Queries for customers and clients on Live calls for latest version of Microsoft Office and Windows such as Windows 7 and 8 for both 32 bit and 64 bit Architecture. •	Involved in Mentoring Team members on working model of end-to-end client business processes. •	Involved in taking Supervisor calls, and provided Quality control training related to troubleshooting and Voice modulation.•	Involved in taking call Follow-ups, Maintaining Reports and Checking CSAT scores of Team.•	Provided complete support to Microsoft UP and Running Unit which involved calls based on issues related to Activation, Installation and Upgrade.•	Managed to take almost 50-60 calls on an average delivering proper support and assistance to US customers.•	Maintained the AHT Target, CSAT scores above 90%, and provided excellent customer support, giving high Call Quality above target.

Description:•	Omega Elevators associate with the most advanced and trusted elevator technologies. Differentiated innovative hi-tech technology, quality & customer satisfaction are the key elements that have helped us scale new heights of success. OMEGA is one of the most reliable companies, committed to delivering exceptional service. With extremely satisfied customers in India and abroad we pride ourselves on being the best in elevator sector. We successfully deliver our products on time, every time and everywhere. •	At Omega, our product range comprises of Elevators serving different market segments. We are a vertically integrated company. Our products are made onsite and manufactured with total commitment to quality and safety norms. Equipment like Gear boxes, duty motors, Driving sheaves, crams (made of wood, M. S., S.S., Gold plated, etc.), Over-speed governors, Door Locks, Microprocessor controllers, Guide rails and many more manufactured using the most modern methods of production under one roof in a state of the art manufacturing plant located at Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India.Responsibilities:•	Involved in Analyzing the Technical Sheet, Calculating, Providing/Taking Measurements, Managing Team and Finalizing Installation.•	Worked on installation of lifts on multiple sites which involved both private and government projects.•	Worked on several sites in Rajasthan which involved analyzing, taking measurements and discussing with clients for further needs and requirements.
